item.title: Building a Production-Ready File Handler for CodeIgniter 4 Settings
item.description: While CodeIgniter 4 Settings includes a database-backed handler, I wanted a file-based option that’s lightweight, fast, and safe for production use. I’ll walk through the challenges of handling concurrency, file locking, and caching, and explain the design choices behind the new FileHandler.
